image.caption: Fuzzy Front End I This is an early attempt to refine the logic and define our partners' needs.
Fuzzy Front End II Attempt to clarify how our capacity could facilitate WHO's communication efficiency.
Analysis on WHO Online Media Usage 1. Headquarter site(left): conservative information structure; statistics hard to locate. 2. Regional site(right): photo slideshow; interactive map.
Unavoidable User Behaviorin Although WHO is restrictive on any publication, emerging user behavior pushes its regulation.

Help WHO Understand Web 2.0 and Its Impact
Meetings with Our Partners in WHO-HAC A tight-scheduled day trip to Geneva helped us validate our concepts and better understand their problems and needs.
